about_the_game:
You are Axel Miller, a carpenter looking for work. After taking on an internship at a lumber mill company, you're suddenly struck from behind, plunging into unconsciousness. Six months later, you awaken, resuming your duties as if nothing transpired.

Moesgaard Skov is lush with extraordinary trees prime for chopping! Using your trusty chainsaw, and your electric trolley, you set out on adventures away from the safety of the mill.

Chopping is only the first part, now you gotta prepare the logs! Debark, Slice, and Saw each log into what shape and size your Boss demands of you. Each Task demands a unique sequence of actions, demanding foresight and strategic planning to utilize each last log!

There's more to Moesgaard Skov than work. Take some time to explore the forest and discover the secrets of your job. But don't go too far, or The Boss won't approve.

content_descriptors.notes: The level of violence in this game ranges from simple blood splatter to dead bodies with realistic gore. While gore and blood are not frequent, it is used to shock players during certain infrequent parts of the game.

Moesgaard Skov is lush with extraordinary trees prime for chopping! Using your trusty chainsaw, and your electric trolley, you set out on adventures away from the safety of the mill.

Chopping is only the first part, now you gotta prepare the logs! Debark, Slice, and Saw each log into what shape and size your Boss demands of you. Each Task demands a unique sequence of actions, demanding foresight and strategic planning to utilize each last log!

name: LumberKILL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: LumberKILL is a Lore-rich Psychological Horror Adventure game about working at a Lumbermill. You will be tasked with increasingly suspicious jobs by your shady boss, each more unsettling than the last. Chop trees, Process logs, and summon god himself in this terrifying game!
